articles.title: This Week in Review
articles.text: Summery of this weeks games, including the finale of the Kohlhurst Murder case, the death of major underworld figure Mister Brandywine and the induction of a new Watchtower 16 squad.

articles.title: Player Spotlight
articles.text: Each month, we highlight one of our player charactors based on the input and voting of our GMs, this week our featured PC is Nami played by Moon
